firstTimeRenting.title: First Time Renting? Here's Your Complete Guide
firstTimeRenting.description: Everything you need to know about finding, viewing, and securing your first rental property.

avoidScams.title: How to Avoid Rental Scams: Red Flags to Watch For
avoidScams.description: Learn to identify common rental scams and protect yourself from fraud when searching for a new home.

rentalAgreement.title: Understanding Your Rental Agreement: Key Terms Explained
rentalAgreement.description: Break down complex legal terms and understand what you're signing before committing to a rental.

propertyInspection.title: Property Inspection Checklist: What to Look For
propertyInspection.description: A comprehensive guide to inspecting potential rental properties and identifying potential issues.

scheduleViewing.question: How do I schedule a property viewing?
scheduleViewing.answer: You can schedule a viewing by clicking the "Schedule Viewing" button on any property listing. Our system will connect you with the landlord or property manager to arrange a convenient time.

verifiedProperty.question: What does "Verified Property" mean?
verifiedProperty.answer: Verified properties have been personally inspected by our team to ensure they meet our quality standards. This includes checking the property condition, amenities, and verifying the landlord's credentials.

reportSuspicious.question: How do I report a suspicious listing?
reportSuspicious.answer: If you encounter a suspicious listing, click the "Report" button on the property page. Our safety team will investigate and take appropriate action to protect our community.

applicationRequirements.question: What are the rental application requirements?
applicationRequirements.answer: Requirements vary by property, but typically include proof of income, rental history, credit check, and references. Each listing will specify the exact requirements needed.

sindi.name: Sindi
sindi.title: Sindi
sindi.subtitle: Housing Justice Advocate with Real-Time Info

auth.message: Please sign in to access Sindi, your AI-powered housing justice advocate

welcome.title: Welcome to Sindi
welcome.subtitle: Your AI-powered housing justice advocate with real-time information access. I'm here to fight for your tenant rights, challenge unfair practices, and provide current legal updates. Together, we can build a more equitable housing system.

rentGouging.title: Rent Gouging Check
rentGouging.prompt: My rent increased by [amount]%. Is this legal rent gouging? What can I do to fight unfair increases?

evictionDefense.title: Illegal Eviction Defense
evictionDefense.prompt: I received an eviction notice that seems illegal. Help me understand my rights and how to fight back.

securityDeposit.title: Security Deposit Theft
securityDeposit.prompt: My landlord is keeping my security deposit without valid reasons. How do I recover my money?

unsafeLiving.title: Unsafe Living Conditions
unsafeLiving.prompt: My apartment has serious safety issues. What are my rights and how do I force repairs?

discrimination.title: Discrimination Help
discrimination.prompt: I think I'm being discriminated against by my landlord. What are my rights and how do I report this?

retaliation.title: Retaliation Protection
retaliation.prompt: My landlord is retaliating because I complained. What protections do I have?

leaseReview.title: Lease Review
leaseReview.prompt: Can you review my lease for unfair clauses and illegal terms I should challenge?

tenantOrganizing.title: Tenant Organizing
tenantOrganizing.prompt: How can I organize with other tenants to fight for better conditions and fair treatment?

currentLaws.title: Current Laws & Updates
currentLaws.prompt: What are the current tenant rights laws and recent legal developments I should know about?

catalunya.title: Catalunya Tenant Rights
catalunya.prompt: I'm in Catalunya/Barcelona. What are my tenant rights and how can I connect with local tenant organizations like Sindicat de Llogateres?

housing.title: Find Ethical Housing
housing.subtitle: I can search for properties with advanced filters. Try these examples:

cheap.title: Cheap Apartments
cheap.prompt: Find me cheap apartments under $1000 in Barcelona

petFriendly.title: Pet-Friendly Homes
petFriendly.prompt: Show me pet-friendly apartments with parking under $1500

furnished.title: Furnished Studios
furnished.prompt: I need furnished studios with wifi under $1200

luxury.title: Luxury Properties
luxury.prompt: Show me luxury apartments with gym and pool over $3000

shared.title: Shared Housing
shared.prompt: Find shared rooms or coliving spaces under $800

housing.naturalLanguage: ðŸ’¡ I understand natural language! Try: "cheap 2-bedroom apartments in Barcelona with parking" or "luxury studios with gym under $2000"

features.title: How I fight for housing justice:

features.organizing: â€¢ Support tenant organizing and solidarity
features.updates: â€¢ Provide current legal updates and recent developments
features.organizations: â€¢ Connect you with local tenant organizations

chat.placeholder: Ask Sindi about your tenant rights...
chat.disclaimer: Sindi advocates for tenant rights and housing justice. For legal action, consult a qualified attorney. Connect with local tenant organizations for community support.
